author: Adam Satariano, Marie Mawad
description: Amazon.com Inc.’s development of package-delivery drones is progressing to the point where the company is now thinking a lot about geese.
title: Amazon's Delivery-Drone Research Asks: How To Avoid Birds?

author: Jason Zweig
description: Finding the next Amazon.com, which first sold shares to the public 20 years ago this week, is hard. In fact, finding the last Amazon was hard, too.
title: Amazon’s 49,000% Gain: The Most ‘Super’ of ‘Superstocks’ Since 1926

author: Mark Gurman
description: Amazon.com Inc. updated its least-expensive tablets, continuing to produce new and updated hardware as a way to attract consumers to its more profitable services.
title: Amazon Refreshes Cheapest Tablets, Drops Price on Fire HD 8

author: Matthew Boyle
description: Wal-Mart Stores Inc. gained momentum in its fight against Amazon.com Inc., with its online sales growing at the fastest clip in at least five years.
title: Wal-Mart's Online Sales Soar as Retail Giant Pursues Amazon

author: Mark Bergen
description: Google is bringing commerce features to its voice-based digital Assistant, a move that may help the company develop new ways of making money from the technology and compete with rival products from Apple Inc., Amazon.com Inc. and Facebook Inc.
title: Google's Digital Assistant Gets a Key Commerce Feature
